pages.text: $(o)"The Moon was born out of destruction, yet the Moon always persists. The Moon brings order, and order is, always, ash. One may wish upon the Moon, but who will listen will be the Witch, who hides behind it. The Moon does not live, nor does it feel, but it definitely exists, and sometimes that is enough."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(l:shaping/entry_thaumagral_variety)Golden Thaumagral$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Order$() aspect.
